entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Airdrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -11.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Calgary Int'l Airport 1:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -11.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -14.6°C
Wind: SSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 5

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening with risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
